generated_body: The article is likely to discuss the implications of President Trump's upcoming tariff decision on the automotive industry. Readers can expect an overview of how various automakers are preparing for potential changes in trade policy and the economic impact these tariffs may have on vehicle pricing and manufacturing operations. The article may also touch upon the reactions from industry leaders and analysts regarding the anticipated outcomes of this decision.
